data.actual_result: The keyboard goes white for a split second before returning the correct colour.
data.expected_result: The keyboard should stay dark/ grey
data.short_description: After exiting the undo menu which can be triggered by shaking the device, the keyboard goes white on dark mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the text box - Start typing - Shake your device to trigger undo feature.- Close the undo menu - Observe the keyboard and keyboard colour
